phrs.translation: 颜色容差, 模糊性, 起毛, 不清晰
语义模糊, 语义模糊性
模糊性, 本体的模糊性
认识的模糊性, 认识上的模糊性, 模糊性

sentences.sentence: Basically there is fuzziness in the procedure of clustering.
sentences.translation: 这些算法在聚类过程中存在模糊性。

sentences.sentence: In the end, fuzziness of CWR stability safety limit is discussed.
sentences.translation: 最后，探讨了无缝线路稳定性安全界限的模糊性。

sentences.sentence: When the Color Range dialogue box appears, set the "Fuzziness" slider to somewhere around 50.
sentences.translation: 当色彩范围对话框出现的时候，设置“模糊性”滚动条到大约50。
